activities.name: Select Table Name
activities.description:
To select the table name, we have to query with a distinct statement the 
crmipk_p table

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT(entity_logical_name) FROM crmipk_p
ORDER BY entity_logical_name ASC

text.value:
DECLARE @entity_logical_name VARCHAR(50), @logical_name VARCHAR(50)
DECLARE @sql VARCHAR(MAX)

DECLARE myCursor CURSOR FOR 
SELECT entity_logical_name, logical_name FROM crmipk_p
WHERE entity_logical_name = '@{variables('entity_logical_name')}'

OPEN myCursor
FETCH NEXT FROM myCursor INTO @entity_logical_name, @logical_name 

-- Create table with entity_logical_name as table name
SET @sql = 'CREATE TABLE ' + QUOTENAME(@entity_logical_name) + '('
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
BEGIN
  -- Add logical_name as a column to the table
  SET @sql = @sql + QUOTENAME(@logical_name) + ' VARCHAR(50), '
  
  FETCH NEXT FROM myCursor INTO @entity_logical_name , @logical_name 
END
-- Remove the trailing comma and close the parentheses
SET @sql = LEFT(@sql, LEN(@sql) - 1) + ')'
EXEC (@sql)

CLOSE myCursor
DEALLOCATE myCursor
